data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Much of the accumulated knowledge of the ancient world was lost. Even ____ the ____ of ____ better ____ thinkers, few ____ survived. Although ____ wrote ____ least ____ books, almost ____ of Hipparchus ' ____ work ____. Of the 150 reputed Aristotelian works, only 30 exist, and some of those are "little more than lecture notes".
data.partBlankContent: Much of the accumulated knowledge of the ancient world was lost. Even o_ the wo___ of t__ better kn___ thinkers, few frag_____ survived. Although h_ wrote a_ least four____ books, almost not____ of Hipparchus ' dir___ work surv____. Of the 150 reputed Aristotelian works, only 30 exist, and some of those are "little more than lecture notes".
data.answer: 许多古代世界积累起来的知识都丢失了。即使是在那些更为知名的思想家的世界里，残存的碎片也寥寥无几。虽然希巴克斯写了至少14本书，但他的直接作品几乎没有留下任何痕迹。在150本著名的亚里士多德著作中，现存的只有30本，其中一些“比课堂讲稿多不了多少”。
